headline: HCLTech to Acquire Telco Solutions Business from Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) to Further Strengthen its Engineering and AI-led Network Propositions to Global Communication Service Providers
summary: HCLTech, a leading global technology company, today signed an agreement to purchase HPE's Telco Solutions business, further strengthening its market-leading position in the telecom industry.

content.title: HCLTech to Acquire Telco Solutions Business from Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) to Further Strengthen its Engineering and AI-led Network Propositions to Global Communication Service Providers
content.summary: HCLTech, a leading global technology company, today signed an agreement to purchase HPE's Telco Solutions business, further strengthening its market-leading position in the telecom industry.

headline: Has HPE’s Multi Year Rally Left Further Upside After Recent Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Hewlett Packard Enterprise is still good value after its strong multi year run, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack exactly what the current price is really telling us. Even after a recent 4.9% pullback over the last week, the stock is still up 13.1% over the past month, 11.9% year to date and 135.6% over five years, which suggests investors have been steadily warming to the story. Those gains have come alongside ongoing demand for HPE's hybrid...
